p: Arylamidase activity was evaluated according to the method of Acosta-Martínez and Tabatabai [43]. 1 g air-dried soil was incubated at 37 °C for 1 h with the substrate L-leucine- β-naphthylamide in THAM buffer (0.1 M, pH = 8.0). The reaction was stopped with ethanol and the product β-naphthylamide was measured colorimetrically at 540 nm after its reaction with p-dimethylamino-cinnamaldehyde.
